author: lehors
msg: small hickup in reorg, XMLErrorReporter moved to impl

author: andyc
msg: I thought better about the location of the error reporter.
It really is a core component and should be in the impl
package. The only reason why I put it in util was to make
it easier for people to write parser components and put
them into a parser configuration. I figured that they
would just need to have access to the symbol table and
error reporter. Since the symbol table is in util already
there is no problem with that class. We can still add some
protected convenience methods on the parser base classes to
allow new components to do error reporting.
